ValidationRule.description: NICC-056815 Users are not allowed to change the Status of Internal Projects from On Hold to any Status other than "Canceled" or "Pending Scheduling"
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = "Commercial_Operation_Projects", NOT( ISNEW() ), Approved__c = TRUE, ISCHANGED(Request_Status__c), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Request_Status__c),"On Hold"), NOT(OR( ISPICKVAL(Request_Status__c, "Canceled"), ISPICKVAL(Request_Status__c, "Pending Scheduling"))), $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator", $Permission.Edit_AH_Project_Backlog_Internal_Projects = FALSE )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: That Status change is not allowed. The only allowed Status changes are "Canceled" or "Pending Scheduling". Please contact the Process Improvement team if you need more assistance.
